start.npcText: Hello there. Need some medical attention, or just passing through?

playerChoices.text: I heard you might be looking for some help yourself. (Offer Recruitment)

offer_healing.npcText: Alright, let's see what I can do. (Healing not implemented yet)

medic_recruit_offer_check_prereqs.npcText: Looking for help, you say? Hmm... what did you have in mind?

playerChoices.text: I'm putting together a team. I could use someone with your skills.

medic_recruit_success.npcText: A team, you say? Well, things have been rather... quiet. Alright, I'm in. Lead the way.

medic_recruit_fail_generic.npcText: I appreciate the offer, but I don't think I'm ready for that right now / I'm not sure you're what I'm looking for.

medic_recruit_fail_quest.npcText: I'd love to help, but I can't leave until the clinic is safe. (You need to complete 'Save the Clinic' quest).

playerChoices.text: I understand. I'll see what I can do about the clinic.

medic_recruit_fail_reputation.npcText: While I appreciate the offer, I need to be careful who I associate with. Perhaps if the community thought better of you...

playerChoices.text: I see. I'll work on that.

medic_recruit_fail_skillcheck.npcText: You seem genuine, but I'm not entirely convinced this is a good idea for me. Sorry.

status_reply.npcText: Doing alright. Ready for whatever comes next.

start_dismiss.npcText: You sure about this? Alright then, it was... an experience. Take care of yourself.
